skillTree.localised_description: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.

effects.description: Mount: Warhorse

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

skillTree.localised_description: Loyal, fierce, powerful and surprisingly fast – a War Bear is a symbol of Kislev itself.

effects.description: Mount: War Bear

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

skillTree.localised_description: To bring fear and panic to a battlefield, few other than the Ice Court’s most accomplished can wrangle a deadly ice drake into their service.

effects.description: Mount: Frost Wyrm

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

skillTree.localised_description: Naught can penetrate the swirling mists of ice and sleet that churn around those afforded Father Bear's protection.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Long has peace in the Old World been bought with the blood of Kislev. When Ruination descends, none are more ready to meet it than the hardy guardians of the north.

effects.description: Ability: "Guardian Call"

ui_effects.localised_text: Summoned units have specific debuffs conditions

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
